description: This file contains a utility class 'Validators' that provides static methods to validate user input fields such as group size, email, password, and name. The methods return error messages or booleans indicating validation success or failure.

classes.name: Validators
classes.description: A utility class with static methods for input validation in a Dart/Flutter project.

methods.name: validateGroupSize
methods.description: Validates that the provided group size is within acceptable bounds (default between 2 and 8). Returns null if valid, otherwise an error message.

methods.name: fitsCapacity
methods.description: Checks whether the requested group size fits into the remaining capacity.

methods.name: validateEmail
methods.description: Rudimentarily validates the format of an email address, checking for presence of '@' and '.' characters.

methods.name: validatePassword
methods.description: Validates that a password meets minimum length requirements (default minimum length is 6).

methods.name: validateName
methods.description: Validates that a name is not empty and has at least two characters.
